txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating the spider menace within the mines of Writhenset.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Radhril for your reward!

'Would you accompany me on a mission, [placeholder]?

'The Free Peoples in the Wildwood have reported hearing the scuttling legs of spiders in and around the mines of Writhenset. There could be a brood within the tunnels.

'If the mines of Writhenset are to ever again be safe, we should investigate this possible spider menace.'
Complete Mission: Brooding in the Depths
Within the depths of the mines of Writhenset, a brood of spiders grows restless.\n\nYour mission is to defeat the spider menace within the mines of Writhenset.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
Your mission is to defeat the spider menace within the mines of Writhenset.\n\nSpeak to Radhril.

'We have done well, [placeholder]. With the spider brood diminished, the mines of Writhenset are now much more safe for the Free Peoples. We should be on the look-out, however. The spiders could just as easily return in greater numbers.'
